entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 28. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 28. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 28. POP 40%
